Description.Name: Mech Bay 3
Description.Details: With the Argo's power systems fully online, the final six 'Mech bays can be powered up and put to work. In the future we should get the automated systems online. Mechbay 3 brings the total number of Mech bays to 18 and +2 Techs.

AssignedCastDescription: The power's back on to the rest of the Mech Bay, and we can start repairs on the last six bays. Even if you don't want to fill them with 'Mechs, believe me, I can put the extra space to good use. It's gonna take a shitload of work, though.
